tool_description: You can use the PamFax API to send faxes, show incoming faxes, create new PamFax users, and a lot more.
name: Pamfax
title: Pamfax

api_list.name: ListVersions
api_list.description: Lists the current Versions.  Result contains versions for the PamFax Gadget, Client etc and returns the version and update url
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com/Common/ListVersions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com/Common/ListVersions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetNumberInfo
api_list.description: Get some information about a fax number.  Result contains zone, type, city, ... Validates and corrects the number too.

required_parameters.name: faxnumber
required_parameters.description: The faxnumber to query (incl countrycode: +12139851886, min length: 8)

api_list.name: ListCountriesForZone
api_list.description: Returns all countries in the given zone  Result includes their translated names, countrycode and country-prefix.

required_parameters.name: zone
required_parameters.description: Zone of the country which is wanted (1-7)

api_list.name: ListLanguages
api_list.description: List all available languages.  Result may be filtered to that only languages are returned that are at least translated $min_percent_translated %

optional_parameters.name: min_percent_translated
optional_parameters.description: the percentage value the languages have to be translated (default: 75)

api_list.name: ListCountries
api_list.description: Returns a preview page for a fax.  May be in progress, sent or from inbox.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com/Common/ListCountries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: ListCurrencies
api_list.description: Returns the list of supported currencies.  Result contains convertion rates too. If $code is given will only return the specified currency's information.

api_list.name: ListSupportedFileTypes
api_list.description: Returns the supported file types for documents that can be faxed.

api_list.name: ListTimezones
api_list.description: List all supported timezones.  TimezonesList result list will contain attributes 'default' and (if a user is logged in) 'user_timezone' which contain that values. Additionally the corresponding list entries are marked with attributes 'is_default' and 'is_user_timezone'.
api_list.code:

url = "https://pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com/Common/ListTimezones"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetPagePrice
api_list.description: Calculate the expected price per page to a given fax number.  Use GetNumberInfo when you do not need pricing information, as calculating expected price takes longer then just looking up the info for a number.

required_parameters.name: faxnumber
required_parameters.description: The faxnumber to query (incl countrycode: +12139851886, min length: 8). Login user first to get personalized prices.

api_list.description: Returns the current culture info data.

api_list.name: VerifyUser
api_list.description: Verifies a PamFax user via username/password

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: Username of the user or the md5 of user's username. That's what he has entered when he registered

required_parameters.name: password
required_parameters.description: The password (or the md5 of the password) that the user entered in the registration process for the given username (case sensitive)

api_list.name: GetCurrentSettings
api_list.description: Returns the current settings for timezone and currency.  This is the format/timezone ALL return values of the API are in. These are taken from the user (if logged in, the api user's settings or the current ip address)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com/Common/GetCurrentSettings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pamfax-pamfax.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetGeoIPInformation
api_list.description: Returns Geo information based on the given IP address (IPV4)

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: the ip to get geo information off

api_list.name: ListStrings
api_list.description: Returns a list of strings translated into the given language.

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description: array of String identifiers. You may also pass a comma separated list as $ids[0] (ids[0]=BTN_YES,BTN_NO).

optional_parameters.name: culture
optional_parameters.description: culture identifier, defaults to users culture. Accepts full culture-codes like en-US, de-DE and just a language code like en, de, ...
